other_tests.findings: Complete sensorineural deafness with hearing threshold levels above 115 dB for frequencies of 500-4000 Hz.
Homozygous point mutation G47R in the BSND gene.
Impaired urinary concentrating ability with maximum urine osmolar concentration of 275 mmol/kg.
Creatinine clearance was 63.8 ml/min per 1.73 mÂ², reduced to 45.8 after 1 week of indomethacin therapy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Decreased from 63.8 ml/min to 45.8 ml/min after treatment.

other_tests.findings: Urinary levels of prostaglandin E2 excretion were markedly elevated (1940-11100 ng/d) and reduced (245-2153 ng/d) under treatment with indomethacin.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Levels decreased under treatment from elevated to reduced range.
